creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: tunic is predominately white; neck opening is circular with slit cut downward in front; made from three panels; two small tassels at bottom of neck slit; tassels also located at bottom of tunic and at bottom of arm slits; sleeves are slits cut into side of fabric; back of tunic has geometric design of black, yellow, brown, and white; design has thick horizontal black bars at top and bottom with diamond pattern in between
title: Tunic
